storyInfo: Enciodes forwards a commission to Rhodes Island to rescue a kidnapped noble, which the Doctor accepts. Unexpectedly, this commission becomes proof of their friendship.

attributes.content: Doctor, no doubt you already know that the Silverash clan's exploration of the outside world began with my ancestors—namely, my grandfather.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As recounted in Kjerag folklore, he once went on an expedition with an adventurer, eventually returning with a wealth of silver and gold.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: While he did in fact spend over ten years away with an adventurer, in truth he returned with nothing of value.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Only a few bits of literature, some tools that were considered advanced at the time, and blueprints.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: These trinkets would go on to greatly influence my father, Olafur, who became the first person in all of Kjerag to study abroad.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: He met my mother Elizabeth while studying in Victoria, where he also made connections among the nobility.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It was then that Viscount Walden became friends with my father.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: When I stayed in the same city on my own trip abroad, I received some assistance from the Viscount. I also met his children—Carle and Kate.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Carle was my age, and full of pride. While he saw me as a rival in all things, he was far from a bad person.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: However, I had the misfortune to learn that he was attacked and killed by Infected some time after we parted.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: After his death, Viscount Walden became more and more hateful towards the Infected, drafting a number of restrictions targeting them.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: I thought Victoria granted the Infected rights.;Yet you passed his request on to us.

attributes.content: Realistically, it all depends on the particular nobles running each city.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Different branches of Karlan Trade also need completely different strategies for working the Infected, depending on local conditions.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Rest assured, Doctor. I shall personally ensure that Rhodes Island's reputation is upheld.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Now, there's no need to be nervous. I've only received reports of your recent activities. I don't know what your plans actually are.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But I surmise that connections with a powerful viscount can only work in your favor.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Regardless, Kate is the subject of our concern this time. She was kidnapped—by Infected.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: This is partly why the Viscount agreed to let me pass this on to you, despite his disgust towards the Infected.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You see, he worries that his own actions may have provoked this, and as such he is willing to employ any means necessary.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The daughter of the Viscount of County Sykes was kidnapped by a group of Infected. They demand a ransom of 100,000 pounds within twenty days, or they will kill the hostage.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Viscount Walden hopes we will be able to find and rescue his daughter.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He is well-known among the nobles of Western Victoria for having his eldest son was slain by the Infected a few years ago, as well as for the strict policies he's enforced on them since.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The laws and regulations the Infected are subject to in Sykes are more stringent than any other county.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: More importantly, Walden's surname is Caster.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: The Caster family is very influential in Western Victoria, and if we can form connections with them, it may save us a lot of trouble down the road.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But therein lies the problem.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Naturally, a noble so hostile to the Infected would not normally entrust this commission to us directly. And in fact, it was passed on through an intermediary.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That intermediary's name is Enciodes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Don't look at me.;Could it be a coincidence?;He must be expecting something.

attributes.content: If you were involved, it'd be reasonable to assume that this might erode your relationship with the rest of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I doubt he'd be so reckless.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A delicious cake, placed before us right when we're most hungry? I am skeptical, to say the least.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I must admit that, ignoring whatever Enciodes might be scheming, this commission is still very tempting.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm inclined to agree.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rhodes Island has been making moves across the nomadic cities of Western Victoria, to find places we can stopover at.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Considering his renown among Victoria's nobility from his time studying abroad, it's hardly surprising that he would have noticed our movements.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If anything though, he is the one with more to lose from this interaction, yet he is the one who reached out to us.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As such, I am forced to understand this as a sign of his trust in you. I can't think of another explanation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Trust...;(Shrug);Stop teasing me.

attributes.content: Your tour in Kjerag earned his 'trust', did it not?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Looks like you understand after all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Or rather, I will treat that as being the case.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I must confess I had the same instinctive response, given what I saw of your operation report.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: However, the mere arrival of this commission proves the value of your trip to Kjerag.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Naturally, I do not intend to pry into your relationships.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I will simply remind you: as our cooperation with Karlan Trade is ongoing, we must be careful how we handle our relationship with Enciodes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Admittedly, your trip to Kjerag has brought about some unexpected benefits.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But you should also understand that what we are about to do next is an exception, and I strongly recommend not getting tangled up with any Victoria-adjacent figures beyond a business capacity.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It is extremely dangerous—for both you and him.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor, I've located the target. They're hiding in the forests on the outskirts of the city.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.options: Good work.

attributes.content: Hardly. All it took was a little asking around, and some tracking in the slums.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: But damn, this city really treats its Infected terribly. They're all miserable here.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: By the look of it, the noble girl's kidnapping was carried out by the only relatively large group of Infected in the city.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: Their security was pretty tight for amateurs, so I took some pictures of the surroundings first.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: These are the pictures taken from around their holdout point.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: And this is a picture I got of their boss.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: I see, so that's what's going on, is it?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Doctor, I have a rather presumptuous request.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Boss, we're running short on food.
attributes.name: Infected Underling

attributes.content: If push comes to shove, butcher 'Sand' and let our brothers eat meat.
H-How could we do that? Isn't she the burdenbeast you raised yourself?!
attributes.name: Infected Underling

attributes.content: People are starving to death, and you're worried about some animal?
*Sigh*...
attributes.name: Infected Underling

attributes.content: Hang in there just a little longer. After we get the money, we'll change our identities and start a new life in another city.
I know.
attributes.name: Infected Underling

attributes.content: Brother, perhaps I should head back home in secret first?
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: Are you stupid? How do you even expect to get back without any skills? Just stay put like a good little hostage.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: And what did I tell you about getting too close to us? Are you TRYING to catch Oripathy? Scram.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: Wh-Who are you people?!
attributes.name: Infected Underling

attributes.content: Easy now. I'm here to speak to your leader.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Well, you're not welcome here! Get out, now, or you're leaving in a body bag!
attributes.name: Infected Underling

attributes.content: Enciodes...
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: You're not going to invite us in, Carle?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Stand down... Let them through.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Infected Underling

attributes.content: You can't beat them.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Rest assured, I didn't bring any weapons or bodyguards.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: So what brings Enciodes, the illustrious president of Karlan Trade, to our humble abode?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: As I recall, the last I saw you was at that ball eight years ago.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: How prideful you were back then, as the eldest son of Viscount Walden.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Yet everyone's eyes were on you the moment you stepped out.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Tch. Damn and blast.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Listen up, Enciodes. I have no interest in waxing lyrical about my days as a noble. I've long since quit that game.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: The only thing I care about right now is how you found this place. You and that enigmatic hooded person next to you. What are you trying to do with just the two of you?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: I'd heard that you died during an Infected riot. Seems the situation was more complicated than that.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You bloody daft or something?!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Just a little curious.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If father asked you to come, then please turn back...
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: I will not be going with you.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: I assume you and Carle planned this kidnapping together, Kate?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And if I'm not mistaken, you must have been the one to come up with the idea.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Yes, you're right...
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: Carle's had a terrible time all these years since he became Infected. I've been trying to aid him and his friends in secret, but there's only so much I can do alone.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: So you offered to let your brother kidnap you, in order to collect a ransom from your father.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Viscount Walden loves you dearly, and will surely be devastated.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I know... I don't want to make father sad either, but I just can't bear to see Carle suffer so.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: Shut your mouth, Kate!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I shouldn't have brought it up...
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: In any case, Enciodes, if you're here as the old man's mouthpiece, I'd recommend you leave, now.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: And if you plan on taking Kate with you, you'll have to ask my brothers what they think of that.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Calm down, you two. Although I did come at your father's request, I stand before you as myself.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And next to me is my friend. 'Doctor' will suffice.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I am here to help you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Help, huh? Help, charity, handouts. Why not just use your favorite word? What was it again... Ah yes, a 'deal'.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: You're free to take it however you like.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: In your eyes, I might as well still be that blowhard of a noble who was always showing off.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Maybe if I were still that same man, I would have some chips to wager with you.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: But now I have nothing.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: You want to make a deal? What would you offer me? And what could I possibly give you?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: That all depends on how this conversation goes.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: First of all, I can assure you that Viscount Walden will never know anything that happens here.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Hah... I can't remember the last time I had a serious talk with anyone other than Kate.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Even if it's coming from you of all people, I can't help but to think back to the old days.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: At least let me thank you for showing me respect, in your own way. Not that I feel at all respected.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: But I knew you couldn't help me the moment you waltzed in here, grand as anything, like the world was already in your hands.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: You want to know why I'm alive? How my quarrel with the old man got to this point?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Fine, I'll tell you.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: You completely stole the spotlight in that ball, and you wouldn't believe how much that upset me.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: So I left the venue early that night, thinking that as long as you were in Sykes, I'd rather be anywhere but there with you.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: And while my head was lost in the clouds, I accidentally ran over a woman.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Now, I'm no saint, but I wouldn't just do a hit-and-run, so I took her to the hospital.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: But when we got there, I found out she was actually Infected, so no one would treat her.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: The most hilarious part though? That the doctors were all so eager to help me, the Viscount's son, right up until they saw the Originium crystals on her skin and recoiled in horror.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: I just couldn't understand at the time. I honestly could not wrap my head around it. I knew that having Oripathy was bad, but I never expected it to be THAT bad.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: So my temper flared up and I brought her back home. Made our personal family doctor see to her.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Naturally, the old man was furious when he found out, but I pushed back against him.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: This all sounds vaguely familiar, but I was busy getting ready to move on to the next city at the time.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That's right, you bastard. You decided to just up and leave after making such a big splash. I don't even want to know how many girls' hearts you took with you.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Looking back though, I have no idea what came over me back then.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: It's not like I wasn't scared of Oripathy, but I couldn't see what about it made everyone shit their pants like that.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: But now I understand how terrifying it truly is. Some patients will straight up explode when they die.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Some don't, but their deaths are still very painful. Heh, better watch yourselves. Maybe I'll blow up too, and take the both of you out with me.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.options: And then what?;That's fairly rare, actually.

attributes.content: Hm? Hey, Hood, your reaction's pretty different from Mister Cool here. You Infected too?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.options: A lot of my friends are Infected.;I can treat you.

attributes.content: No wonder you seem so comfortable with all this.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: If you're that bored, why don't you go hang out with my brothers?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: This is none of your business.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: You're really a doctor then?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Spare me. You think I can afford a medical bill?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: In any case, the old man wouldn't let the lady stay in his house, so I had her convalesce in my own courtyard.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: For the longest time, she thought I was planning to do something to her, but it was much simpler than that. I just wanted her to get better.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: I was a complete idiot at the time. I'd push back against anyone that tried to go against me, no matter the reason.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: The old man wanted to kick her out, so I insisted on keeping her. She thought she'd be a burden on me, so I wanted to look after her even more.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: You fell in love.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Damn right I did. It's a story as old as time. A noble and a commoner fall in love, but the family will never approve. Finally, father and son turn against each other.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Only difference is, the commoner was Infected, and the father had a hand in tormenting her to death. So the noble infected himself as revenge against his father.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: I see. So that's the basis of both your 'death' as well as Viscount Walden's hatred of the Infected.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Naturally. His son with a bright future fell in love with an Infected and turned against him. Unwilling to admit his own failures, who else could he blame but the Infected?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: And... I was already the Infected he hated the most.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: The news of my death wasn't a lie, Enciodes.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: The man named Carle Caster died, seven years ago.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Look, you have that expression on your face again.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: What do you think is going to happen even if I do get the ransom?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: I share the money with my brothers, then we move to another city and live out the rest of our lives in peace?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: No, we'll still be turned away at every door, simply because we are Infected.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: We'll still be looked down on. We'll still have stones thrown at us. We'll still be driven to suffer in the slums.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Even if we wanted to work, nobody would take us in. The only thing left for us would be to find a cozy little alley to die in.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Of course, the money wouldn't hurt. A few of us have already starved to death.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: But how much would that money actually be worth?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: After years of groveling, struggling to survive with my Infected brothers, I finally understand.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: The Infected cannot survive.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: I've heard of a group called Reunion that was uniting the Infected. And of an organization called Rhodes Island trying to save our lives.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Who knows when their help will ever reach us?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: It may not happen in my lifetime.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: But at very least, they have the ability to help because they know how hard it is for us to even survive.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: But you. You know nothing.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Carle...
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: So, you might as well kill me right now. Bring Kate back to the old man, claim his reward.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Or, just turn back. You can even tell him everything, if you want. What difference does it make?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Point is, there's nothing you can do for me.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: It seems I've made something of a fool of myself.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Let's go, Doctor.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Doctor, I have a question.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Did I act out of line when dealing with Carle?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: No.;You were the same as usual.

attributes.content: In other words, my usual performance didn't work in front of him.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That's... Carle?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: He's headed out alone... in the direction of the city?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Follow him.;That look on your face...

attributes.content: I'm begging you, my sister seriously needs an anti-infection device.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: This is all the money I've got, but I assure you, give me a few days and I'll come up with the rest. Let me take out an IOU on this, and I swear I'll pay it back double!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Shoo, away with you! Stop coming here to beg every day, it's pissing me off.
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: Like hell I'd believe that you can get that kind of money in a few days. That's what every debt-ridden deadbeat says. What's to say that you won't just take the blasted thing and I never see you again?
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: Besides, Lord Walden has decreed that we aren't allowed to sell anything to the Infected within the city.
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: But I can't get my hands on anything like that in the slums!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: I've looked all over to find you. Everyone speaks of how kind you are, so can't you see how desperate I am? Can't you help me just this once?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: This is everything I have on me. Whatever you want, just take it.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Or maybe I can earn my keep? I swear, I won't let anyone find out that I'm Infected!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Please... I'm begging you... Just this once...
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Fine, enough of that. How could you possibly have anything of value on you?
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: Come in. Keep wailing like that, and you might even attract the guards.
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.content: Thank you, thank you so much!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: And get off your knees already, you're going to dirty up my floor.
attributes.name: Merchant

attributes.options: We'll need a spare protective suit.

attributes.content: Roger that.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.options: Surprised?

attributes.content: Somewhat.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: No, I'll admit it, I'm surprised.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Now I better understand why he said I can't do anything for him...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And Kate, how long do you plan on following us?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: Did you know of this?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Yes, I knew. But there's nothing I can do.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: If I went up there right now, Carle would just tell me to leave.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: I know this is shameful Enciodes, but... I- I want you to help my brother!
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: He's already refused my help.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If he were only after the ransom, I wouldn't have risked myself to come here, so... I don't want you to misunderstand him.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: But, you've always been ever so reliable, and there is no one else I can turn to, so please!
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: I'll do what I can.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As you said, I was, in fact, the one to bring up the kidnapping plan.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: And ever since my 'kidnapping', I've been living with my brother and the other Infected.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: While I dare not say that I completely understand their plight, I have at least some idea of what they're going through.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: Back then, he plunged a chunk of Originium into his arm, right in front of me and our parents, before rushing out of the house.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: It took two years to find him again in the slums, completely by chance.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: His impetuous temper from before had turned violent, as you've seen, but to me, the biggest change in him was that––
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: Even though he's alive, he doesn't seem to be living.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm not sure how exactly to describe it...
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: He's gotten himself battered and bruised so many times for the sake of his friends, but he doesn't seem to care.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: And as you saw just now, he'll grovel and denigrate himself without a second thought as long as it's for the sake of others.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: The only person he doesn't care about is himself.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: It's the same with the kidnapping, really...
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.options: He's never cared about the ransom.;He wants to give up his life for something?

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: Kate...?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Oh no, Carle...
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: Enciodes too, and even Hood...? Y-You saw everything?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Did you bring them here, Kate?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: No, I swear.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: We followed you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Lords these days. How easily they admit to tailing people, hah!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Carle.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I already told you, there's nothing you can do for me.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: So just stay up there in your ivory tower. You shouldn't feel even a pang of conscience over a pathetic existence like mine.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: It's better this way. For you and me both.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Let's go, Kate.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Umm...
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Enciodes.
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: Doctor, I brought what you asked for.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.options: Thanks.
So what do you think?

attributes.content: Oh, were you asking me?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.options: That's right, you.

attributes.content: Well, I've been basically watching over you in secret this whole time, so I more or less saw the whole thing.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: And I do have an opinion on it. Since you asked, maybe you can tell me if I'm right.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: The ransom is only part of what this Carle guy is after.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: He does want it, but not for himself. It's for the other Infected who've gathered at his side.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Meanwhile, he doesn't really care what happens to himself.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: He used to be nobility, a young lord. But after infecting himself, he's lived in the city as a beggar for years.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Falling from such a great height has only highlighted the oppression of the Infected for him.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Because before all that, he may well have been one of the oppressors.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: From another perspective, the death of his loved one made him choose the most irrational, impulsive method of exacting revenge on his father.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: And the consequences of that not only banished him to the streets, but also drove his father to ratchet up the oppression.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: That has always been a source of the contradiction in his heart.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: So I think what he really wants comes after he gets the ransom.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: As for his specific plans... Well, the lives of normal people mean little to him, let alone the lives of our Infected.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: So I'm guessing either murder or suicide.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.options: Let's go.

attributes.content: Doctor, that's the direction of Carle's camp.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: I know where I'm going.

attributes.content: That being the case, I suppose this is where we part ways for now.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: There is one thing I'd like to apologize to you for.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I should have stayed out of this after I took on the role of an intermediary and passed the commission on to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But it would appear that the situation has changed.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'll admit, even when you got involved in Kjerag, I didn't feel as restricted as I do now.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You are reminding me to answer a question that I've been avoiding for over a year.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I must ask you once more, just how important is this question for you, Dr. {@nickname}?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: For me personally, very.;I choose my partners carefully.

attributes.content: In that case, I'm afraid I have no choice but to produce my answer.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Rhodes Island will uphold the way it's always done things.

attributes.content: Just as I have my own methods.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: I just have one question.
Enciodes, what will you use to bargain for his life?

attributes.content: Three days later
To be honest, Doctor, even now I find it hard to believe that you're the one from Rhodes Island who saved all those Infected.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: I always thought you were just a legend.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: What I find even harder to believe though is that you came here with Enciodes.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.options: Life works in mysterious ways.;We just happen to be acquainted.

attributes.content: ...Haha, true. It really does.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: I really hated that guy, back in the day.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: But there was nothing in particular I hated about him. I was just jealous.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: I still am.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Setting everything else aside though, I'm willing to place my trust in you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: So, if something happens to me... I'd like you to take care of Kate and my brothers.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Enciodes? What are you doing here?!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Did you really think that Viscount Walden would risk coming out to this barren wasteland to cut a deal in person?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What the—?!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: The Viscount has authorized me to serve as his agent in this transaction.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: He... This is his flesh-and-blood daughter we're talking about! How could he... How dare he!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: You were the one who kidnapped his daughter. What right do you have to judge his decisions?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Good... Great! This is just perfect!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: If that's what you want... fine! Someone, bring out the hostage!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Carle...
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: The money for the girl.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Have your people put the box in the middle, then we'll release the girl.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: No objections.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Go, Kate.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: (*whispers*) Go back to where you belong.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Carle... *sobs*...
attributes.name: Noble Sister

attributes.content: It seems the exchange was successful.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We've got the box, boss!
attributes.name: Infected Underling

attributes.content: If everything's there, then hurry up and run!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Infected Underling

attributes.content: Do you seriously think the Viscount would let us go?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Isn't that right, Enciodes?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Tch... Run, brothers, hurry!
attributes.name: Infected Underling

attributes.content: What do we do, Doctor?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Attacking one of the Viscount's guards would spell serious trouble... But are we just going to stand by and watch?
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.options: Ensure their safety.
But we don't have to attack them.

attributes.content: I thought you'd let them run a bit further ahead of time.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I needed to make sure they got their money. Plus, with their skills, if I let them run away first, you'd just hold them up to threaten me.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: 'Make sure that they got their money'... In other words, you never planned on leaving here alive, correct?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Alive?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: What does it mean to be alive, Enciodes?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Does having a heartbeat count as being alive?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Or is being alive watching your loved one's body get dragged away like an old rag?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Or watching other people die in front of your eyes because they can't get medicine?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: I don't know how to be alive anymore. All I know is how I want to die.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: It was supposed to be me and the old man dying here today.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: I would've told him that his son still lives. Then I would've killed him, and then myself.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: That's all I wanted. My one and only desire.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: So why did you have to stomp out the embers of even that last little bit of desire?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: You rejected my help, so I can only resolve this using my own methods.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Haha... that's right. That's exactly the kind of person you are.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Also, I can assure you of at least one thing. The Viscount already knows.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The look of horror on his face when he heard his son was still alive was positively brilliant.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Hoping I'll die slightly more at peace?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Indeed, that was my intent.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Then I've changed my mind, Enciodes. I'll kill you, then I'll kill the old man.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: And what about after that?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We'll see when we get there!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Die for me!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: You've woken up.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You... Why...
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Why didn't you kill me? Out of pity?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: Carle, when you said that there was nothing I could do for you, what you really meant was that I don't understand the plight of the Infected.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And I must admit, that is true.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As I was returning to the Viscount, the Doctor asked me a question.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What would I use to bargain for your life?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I thought about it for a long time. I didn't want to answer with words like revenge, hope, or the future.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Finally, I reached my conclusion.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I will use the lives of all of your friends to save yours.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: As of now, all of them in this city have already died. Including you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Next, they will move to one of my branch offices in a neighboring city and begin a new life there.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The same goes for you. Of course, if you have any objections, I will respect your wishes.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: They... aren't dead?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: The people chasing them are my men.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Ha... Haha... You bastard... How arrogant can you get?
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: I won't deny it.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You don't need to worry about the Viscount. The only problem is your sister... I'm very sorry, but you two will have to be separated.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I wouldn't have gone to see her even without your arrangement.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: She's better off forgetting about this good-for-nothing brother of hers.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: But... give me some time. To think it over.
attributes.name: Infected Brother

attributes.content: You have all the time in the world.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Doctor.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: We make a pretty good duo, huh?;You should be thanking me.

attributes.content: Flawless.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: True.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: This commission was originally my way of apologizing to you, but as it turns out, now I owe you an even bigger favor.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Also, I failed to help you establish a connection to Viscount Walden.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Truly, a series of uncharacteristic gaffes on my part.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Regardless, this incident has provided me with a novel perspective on certain matters.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Give me some time, Doctor, and I will pay you back in a way that satisfies you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I've finished reading the report.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In terms of outcomes, this was a resounding failure. Not only did we fail to establish a relationship with Viscount Walden, we might even be blacklisted by him now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Therefore we no longer have the option of using his network to find a stopover point for Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Sorry.;I don't regret it.;You know you'd have done the same thing.

attributes.content: I wasn't finished.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But from the standpoint of Rhodes Island, you made the correct choice.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You shouldn't, as you've done nothing that warrants regret.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rhodes Island has no desire to be involved with that sort of nobleman anyway, unless absolutely necessary.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I might have taken an even more decisive approach.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Although I won't deny that the results would probably be similar.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Besides, we didn't walk away from this commission empty-handed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Although even I cannot predict what effects this will bring about down the road.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: While speaking, Kal'tsit pulls out a document from the archive's sky-high pile of papers and hands it over.
It looks to be a temporary operator cooperation request. The operator in question calls himself SilverAsh.
Enciodes.

attributes.options: How is this possible?!;......;He...

attributes.content: This arrived just yesterday.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You can imagine the HR Department's confusion when he requested to join Rhodes Island as an operator.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In the end, I was forced to handle the situation in person, and to cut straight to the result—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He accepted all the conditions I laid out for him, and passed the operator exam with flying colors.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: No wonder everyone on the way looked so bewildered.

attributes.content: He's waiting for you in the reception room right now. You should give him a tour of Rhodes Island while you're there.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: What's the meaning of this?;This is your way of paying me back?;SilverAsh?

attributes.content: Ensia has been receiving treatment here while working as an operator. As her older brother, naturally I was concerned and decided to follow suit.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Is there something wrong with that?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: This is the end result of a thorough deliberation.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Using my clan name as my code name is easy to remember, no?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Carle accepted my offer. Rest assured, no one will know where he or his friends ended up.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Speaking of which, the new monitoring bracelet you gave me is much better than the previous one.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'm interested in purchasing a batch myself.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Perhaps we can sit down to discuss it.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Why would you become an operator?;I thought I misread it when Kal'tsit showed me.

attributes.content: Are you asking why I signed that lopsided contract Madam Kal'tsit drafted?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That is simply a price I'm willing to pay to become a member of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: You know that's not what I'm talking about.;Why?;Rhodes Island isn't a good fit for you.

attributes.content: No need to be so pushy.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If I had any ulterior motives, I wouldn't be going through all this, now would I?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Surely someone as smart as you would be able to guess the reason?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: No need to be so diplomatic. 'You don't belong here.'
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I must admit, this is a rather bold experiment, even for my tastes.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Get to the point.;What are you trying to do?

attributes.content: I want to be your friend, {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Does the president of Karlan Trade lack friends?;I thought we were already friends.

attributes.content: I have plenty of business partners, subordinates, competitors, and enemies. What I'm missing is—
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: A friend.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I trust we've already reached a tacit understanding, to some degree.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But understanding between individuals is always asymmetric, which is why I do not trust tacit understandings, Doctor.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The best way to know what someone else is thinking will always be to ask them directly, no?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: There are plenty of others who could do it.;A lot of people understand you.

attributes.content: Such as?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Enya.

attributes.content: Enya is doing superbly right now. Better than I could have imagined.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We did reach a mutual understanding, in a sense, but that is precisely the reason we were able to clearly see each others' choices.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: All I can say is she would be a very suitable partner, but not a friend.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Ensia.

attributes.content: I realize that Ensia is no longer a child. She has keen insight into a variety of matters.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I will give her everything she wants, and respect her opinions.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But there are far more things I cannot tell her than things I can.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Gnosis.

attributes.content: Gnosis seems to have already made quite a name for himself in your lab, thanks to his talent and personality. He may be knowledgeable about many things, but that is a product of the years we spent together.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: He is not someone I can share anything with, and he understands that better than I do.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Degenbrecher.

attributes.content: Degenbrecher and I are on sublime terms, and it is true that she has great insight in many areas.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The thing is, she doesn't care. She deliberately keeps herself uninvolved in most affairs. From her perspective, much of what I do is merely inviting trouble for myself.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And I can't deny that.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Matterhorn and Courier.

attributes.content: Matterhorn and Weiss... I trust them implicitly, and feel comfortable handing them many responsibilities.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: While I won't say that our relationship as superior and subordinate creates a distance between us, realistically speaking we will always have a hard time reaching a mutual understanding. As the giver and recipient of trust.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: So, as you can see...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I can share bits and pieces of myself with each of the people you mentioned.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But for various reasons, I cannot share everything with them, just as they cannot share everything with me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: You've drawn too many lines.;Because they all have ties to Kjerag...

attributes.content: I never wanted to.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Just as nobody asked me if I wanted to become head of the clan that year.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I've grown accustomed to weighing the value of each and every person I encounter, and designating a role for them on my path to progress.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Within the spheres I have designated for them, I am completely genuine.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But nobody can claim it all.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: At the core of my enterprise is the land of Kjerag, to the point that all the people I find around me are intimately connected to the land itself.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Most of the time, this isn't a bad thing.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: However, I have realized that I am lacking an objective viewpoint who can criticize or discuss matters concerning myself.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Enya and Ensia were still very young when our parents suddenly passed away.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The family's heavy responsibilities fell completely onto my shoulders. For both my sisters and the clan, I could only grit my teeth and pick up the mantle as a Silverash.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: After a few years of this, I realized that nothing would ever change from simply remaining the head of a clan in Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: So I left to study in Victoria, following in my father's footsteps.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What happened during my time abroad would make a fascinating topic for another time, should you be interested.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But judging from the results, I made the correct decision. If I hadn't left, I would never have understood what Kjerag needed, nor what challenges it would face.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: A few years later, I voluntarily ended my studies and returned with my capital and connections to form Karlan Trade.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'll admit the whole process was originally meant to take much longer. While abroad, most of my time was dedicated to studying and networking, though it is not as if I didn't have moments of leisure as well.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Unfortunately though, the alarm bells ringing in my heart pushed me to make my decision early.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: What comes after is the history of Karlan Trade's development.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I cannot claim full credit for our achievements, but I have indeed put everything I have into it, and into the land.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: I know. It hasn't been easy for you.;You want someone to talk to.

attributes.content: It seems that we share a propensity to tease others.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I won't say I've grown weary, but I've never been one to fail to understand the importance of relaxation.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If I were only here because I needed someone to talk to... then I would lack the qualifications to be your friend.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: People like us would never say that hard work alone makes efforts worth acknowledging, nor would we use it as an excuse.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Quite the contrary. I want to share what I've experienced in my life with someone worthy of my recognition.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: But what does this have with you joining Rhodes Island?

attributes.content: I originally thought that our cooperation would remain on a business level, but you seemed to insist that your business is inseparably connected to all of us.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And you've managed to convince me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Kjerag has experienced hardly any Catastrophes in the past, and as such, the people of Kjerag have little innate prejudice against the Infected.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That said, the role they play in society, what they've experienced, what they will experience...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I must admit, I had failed to adequately consider these things.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: When I issued articles of incorporation modeled after Victoria's statutes, all I had in mind were some commonplace management tricks.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: That's already more than enough.;I'm not trying to force you.

attributes.content: But not enough to become your friend, now is it?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But if were to become friends, you would have that privilege.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I need to gain a deeper understand of the Infected, and of Rhodes Island's business.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You've helped me realize that this isn't important just for Karlan Trade, but for the way I view this world.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And after getting to know you, the simplest way to achieve this seems to be to work with you and Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Which is why I became SilverAsh.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Or, put more simply, friends need to see each other every once in a while, don't they?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I've grown accustomed to dealing with others as a transaction, where one party provides something of value and the other reciprocates with equal value, neither side owing anything to the other.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But friendship, family, and love cannot be assigned a value.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As such, I must choose my partners carefully.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: I'd love to hear about your time abroad.;Do I have the option to refuse?;You're a terrible judge of character.

attributes.content: I'll be staying here for a few days, so we'll have plenty of time for that.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Perhaps you will be able to glean some of the secrets of the Victorian nobility from the vignettes I share with you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Obviously. If a third party were present for this conversation, they would quickly discover—
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That I did not come here to 'establish' a friendship at all, but simply to have a chat with a friend.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If that's the case, then the same must be true for you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Alright, Doctor, you're still responsible for showing me around the landship.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We can talk more along the way.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: No objections.;Okay.;*Sigh*...

attributes.content: One more thing.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'll admit that doing things this way may have come as a surprise. Perhaps even caused you some trouble.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But the next time you see me, you should be glad.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: After all, nobody is better suited to solve your problems than me. Isn't that right?
attributes.name: Enciodes
